languages.text: {n}Порядки на добывающих комплексах немного смягчились — надзирателям строго указали наносить профилактические побои лишь кулаками и ногами, но не шоковыми дубинками, а наказание за невыработку нормы сменили с жестокой децимации на гуманное лишение пайка. Каторжане возрадовались.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Порядки на добывающих комплексах немного смягчились — надзирателям строго указали наносить профилактические побои лишь кулаками и ногами, но не шоковыми дубинками, а наказание за невыработку нормы сменили с жестокой децимации на гуманное лишение пайка. Каторжане возрадовались.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed to not use the electrical batons during the preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the punishment for not fulfilling the quota replaced the cruel decimation with the humane deprivation of rations. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed to not use the electrical batons during the preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the punishment for not fulfilling the quota replaced the cruel decimation with the humane deprivation of rations. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

languages.text: {n}矿井的惩罚措施在一定程度上放宽了些。监察员得到了严格命令，在进行预防性殴打的时候不得使用电棍，只能使用拳脚。而对于那些未能完成配额的凡人，惩罚方式从残忍的屠杀被换成了人道的剥夺口粮，所有囚犯都为此欢欣雀跃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}矿井的惩罚措施在一定程度上放宽了些。监察员得到了严格命令，在进行预防性殴打的时候不得使用电棍，只能使用拳脚。而对于那些未能完成配额的凡人，惩罚方式从残忍的屠杀被换成了人道的剥夺口粮，所有囚犯都为此欢欣雀跃。{/n}
{n}矿井的惩罚措施稍微放宽了些。监察员得到了严格命令，在进行预防性殴打的时候不得使用电棍，只能使用拳脚。而对于那些未能完成配额的凡人，惩罚方式从残忍的屠杀被换成了人道的剥夺口粮，所有囚犯都为此欢欣雀跃。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las normas de las instalaciones mineras se relajaron en cierta medida: los supervisores recibieron órdenes estrictas de no usar las porras eléctricas en las palizas preventivas (solo puños y piernas) y la cruel práctica de la matanza quedó reemplazada por la compasiva privación de raciones como castigo por no cumplir la cuota. Los convictos estaban eufóricos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las normas de las instalaciones mineras se relajaron en cierta medida: los supervisores recibieron órdenes estrictas de no usar las porras eléctricas en las palizas preventivas (solo puños y piernas) y la cruel práctica de la matanza quedó reemplazada por la compasiva privación de raciones como castigo por no cumplir la cuota. Los convictos estaban eufóricos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鉱山施設の規則は少し緩和された...看守らは予防目的で殴打する際に、電気バトンを使用してはならず...拳と足のみを使用するよう、厳しく指示された。そして、残酷な断食は、ノルマを達成できなかった場合の罰としての人道的な配給没収に変更された。受刑者たちは喜んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鉱山施設の規則は少し緩和された...看守らは予防目的で殴打する際に、電気バトンを使用してはならず...拳と足のみを使用するよう、厳しく指示された。そして、残酷な断食は、ノルマを達成できなかった場合の罰としての人道的な配給没収に変更された。受刑者たちは喜んだ。{/n}
{n}鉱山施設の規則は少し緩和された...看守らは予防目的で殴打する際に、電気バトンを使用してはならず...拳と足のみを使用するよう、厳しく指示された。そして、残酷な断食は、ノルマを達成できなかった場合の罰としての人道的な配給没収に変更された。受刑者たちは喜んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le règlement de la mine se relâche un peu, les contremaîtres recevant des instructions strictes leur interdisant d'utiliser leurs matraques électriques de manière préventive, et de privilégier pour cela les poings et les pieds. En cas de manquement aux quotas imposés, la pratique discutable des mises à mort systématiques est remplacée par des privations de rations, jugées plus humaines. Les détenus s'en réjouissent largement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le règlement de la mine se relâche un peu, les contremaîtres recevant des instructions strictes leur interdisant d'utiliser leurs matraques électriques de manière préventive, et de privilégier pour cela les poings et les pieds. En cas de manquement aux quotas imposés, la pratique discutable des mises à mort systématiques est remplacée par des privations de rations, jugées plus humaines. Les détenus s'en réjouissent largement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Regeln der Mineneinrichtungen wurden etwas gelockert: Den Aufsehern wurde die Verwendung ihrer Elektroschocker im Rahmen präventiver Züchtigungen ausdrücklich untersagt. Sie durften nur noch ihre Hände und Füße benutzen und die grausame Praxis der Dezimierung als Strafe für die Nichterfüllung der Quoten wurde abgeschafft und durch eine humane Streichung von Rationen ersetzt. Die Sträflinge jubelten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Regeln der Mineneinrichtungen wurden etwas gelockert: Den Aufsehern wurde die Verwendung ihrer Elektroschocker im Rahmen präventiver Züchtigungen ausdrücklich untersagt. Sie durften nur noch ihre Hände und Füße benutzen und die grausame Praxis der Dezimierung als Strafe für die Nichterfüllung der Quoten wurde abgeschafft und durch eine humane Streichung von Rationen ersetzt. Die Sträflinge jubelten.{/n}

{n}Die Regeln in den Minen wurden etwas gelockert: Die Wärter erhielten strikte Anweisung, auf keinen Fall ihre Elektroschocker für präventive Prügel einzusetzen — sondern nur ihre Fäuste und Füße. Und die grausame Praxis der Dezimierung wurde als Strafe für eine Untererfüllung der Quoten abgeschafft und durch eine humane Streichung von Rationen ersetzt. Die Sträflinge jubelten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maden tesislerinde kurallar bir nebze esnetildi. Gözetmenlere, önlem amaçlı attıkları dayaklarda şok coplarını sakınarak yalnızca yumruk ve tekmelerini kullanma talimatı verildi. Buna ek olarak iş yükümlülüklerini tamamlamayan mahkûmlar için ölüm cezası yerine erzaktan mahrum bırakma cezası getirildi. Hükümlüler bayram etti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities were relaxed to a degree: the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their shock batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet — and the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}
